_header: Every man and woman hath great need
_description: ‘Sex obseruanda omni Christiano in extremis’ — twenty-four quatrains

BodDou322.First Lines:
Euery man and woman that grete nedeThat be of age or that they
                    dye…
BodDou322.Last Lines:
…We haue heuen to oure herytageThat cryste for vs ordeyned
                    Amen

BLHar1706.First Lines: Euery man and woman hath grette nedeThat be of age or that they deye…
BLHar1706.Last Lines: …We haue heuen to oure herytageThat cryst for vs ordeyned
BLHar1706.Note: Begins written as verse with some lines running over two lines of column, but soon turns to written as prose with gaps and paraphs to indicate beginnings of lines; ends “Amen” at end of last line (f. 19rb).
BLHar1706.Attributed Title: “Hec sex obseruanda sunt omni Christiano in extremis…” in rubric, followed by Latin text of same content (ff. 19va-19vb).
BLHar1706.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 1706.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_1706.
